_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Urban Terror 4.3
author: seanbarr1988@gmail.com
description: Urban Terror started as a realism based "total conversion" mod for Quake III Arena. Nowadays, Urban Terror is played using the free, stand-alone, ioquake3 engine modified, which doesn't require Quake III Arena, in addition to being an add-on to id Software's Quake III Arena.
startup: ./Quake3-UrT-Ded.{{EXE}}  +exec "server.cfg" +set fs_game "q3ut4" +set fs_basepath "/home/container" +set fs_homepath "/home/container" +set dedicated "2" +set com_hunkmegs "128" +set net_port {{SERVER_PORT}}

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt-get update
apt-get -y install wget curl zip unzip

cd /tmp/

echo "Downloading Urban Terror 4.3"
wget http://cdn.urbanterror.info/urt/43/releases/zips/UrbanTerror434_full.zip

echo "Unpacking Urban Terror 4.3"
unzip UrbanTerror434_full.zip
cp -r UrbanTerror43/* /mnt/server/

echo "Setting up default configs"
mv /mnt/server/q3ut4/server_example.cfg /mnt/server/q3ut4/server.cfg
mv /mnt/server/q3ut4/autoexec_example.cfg /mnt/server/q3ut4/autoexec.cfg
mv /mnt/server/q3ut4/mapcycle_example.txt /mnt/server/q3ut4/mapcycle.txt

# prevent unnecessary file creation by the game server
mkdir /mnt/server/.q3a && chmod 444 /mnt/server/.q3a

# Remove files that are not required
rm -rf /mnt/server/Quake3-UrT.*
rm /mnt/server/*.exe
rm /mnt/server/q3ut4/*.doc
rm /mnt/server/q3ut4/readme*

variables.name: Server Version
variables.description:
What version of the server to launch. 32 or 64 bit version. Default is 64bit server.   
x86_64     (64bit Server)
i386           (32bit Server)
